abstract: Coors Light is extending its presence in the new media with efforts on the social networking Web sites Facebook and MySpace.
snippet: Coors Light is extending its presence in the new media with efforts on the social networking Web sites Facebook and MySpace.
lead_paragraph: BEER has long been marketed as a sociable beverage, from a campaign for Budweiser that carried the theme “When gentlemen agree” to the Löwenbräu jingle that began, “Here’s to good friends.” Now, another beer brand, Coors Light, is extending its presence in the new media with efforts on the social networking Web sites Facebook and MySpace.

headline.main: For Coors Light, a Night Out That Begins on MySpace
headline.print_headline: For Coors Light, a Night Out That Begins on MySpace
